response.job_title: Energy modeller | Open source software developer | Control and protection design for extra-high-voltage substations
response.skills: Renewable Energy, Self-employment, Software Development, Energy Systems, Predictive Modeling, Data Science, Scripting, Power Engineering, Systems Analysis, Technical Computing, Energy Production, Energy Efficiency, Data Analytics, Computer Simulations, Simulation Software, Programming, Modeling and Simulation, Mathematical Programming, Gurobi, Databases

profile_positions.description:
Energy modeling: Energy transition for Germany, power-to-x, and grid integration. Investigation on the effects of sector coupling on the electrical grid and the benefits of new flexibility options: Dynamic line rating, demand side management, and electric vehicles chargers.

Software development: develop the open-source software eTraGo (Electric Transmission Grid Optimization) based on PyPSA, which is able to perform spatial and temporal clustering, as well as techno-economical optimization focused on network and storage expansion (heat, hydrogen, and batteries). Based on Python and SQL. Available at: https://etrago.readthedocs.io/

Scenario development: Create midterm and long-term realistic scenarios for Germany and neighboring countries in high spatial and temporal resolution. Electricity, gas, heat, and electric mobility were considered.
profile_positions.title: Energy modeller

profile_positions.description:
- Find potential areas for solar and wind farms based on GIS data.
- Calculate the impact of Dynamic Line Rating (DLR) in the optimization process of the German power grid expansion.
- Integration of scripts to the Github Repository
- Prepare results reports
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
The activities that I developed were:
-Analyze availability of resources for proposed projects.
-Develop power flow simulation models based on DigSilent for new renewable energy projects in Colombia. 
-Evaluate the technical feasibility of the simulated projects and the impacts on the electrical Colombian network. It includes short circuit, stability, and harmonics analysis.
 -Write reports analyzing the technical impact of the project in the midterm. Technical details, explanations, and conclusion were included to be evaluated by the electricity operator company.
profile_positions.title: Renewable Energies System Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Engineering of substation automation and protection systems:

- Single line diagrams design with control and protection concepts
- Logic diagrams design
- Detailed engineering Design for control, protection, auxiliary services, and communication panels.
Technical support:
- Project Management support on technical issues
- Proposal preparation for substation automation and protection projects
- Customer Care support

Process enhancement / Quality management:
- Responsible for continuous improvement of engineering process
- Job execution in compliance with ISO9001, process and work instructions, health & safety regulations
profile_positions.title: High voltage substation engineer

profile_positions.description:
In this position I was responsible for:

-Development of reliability analysis to electric urban and rural networks.
-Equipment location in the electric network by reliability criteria, maximizing the impacts of investments since the focus of service quality and profit.
-Supervision of the installation of equipment such as reclosers and sectionalizers, considering safety procedures based on the applicable standard.
